movie.title: Sniper: Ultimate Kill
movie.description_intro: For the first time, Brandon Beckett, Richard Miller and Sgt. Thomas Beckett join forces in Colombia to take down a brutal drug cartel.
movie.description_full: For the first time, Brandon Beckett, Richard Miller and Sgt. Thomas Beckett join forces in Colombia to take down a brutal drug cartel.

movies.title: Stranger from Canton
movies.summary: Japan has already occupied Korea and now China. Chin, a young woman understands that the Motherland demands all her children to be brave, and sacrifice their lives for the liberation. Disguised as a prostitute, she will board a train to help a Chinese guerrilla group defeat a Japanese army convoy.

Disguised as a prostitute, she will board a train to help a Chinese guerrilla group defeat a Japanese army convoy.

movies.title: The Fitzgerald Family Christmas
movies.summary: The adult siblings of the Fitzgerald family prepare for their estranged father to return home for Christmas for the first time since he walked out on his family 20 years ago.
movies.description_full: The adult siblings of the Fitzgerald family prepare for their estranged father to return home for Christmas for the first time since he walked out on his family 20 years ago.
movies.synopsis: The adult siblings of the Fitzgerald family prepare for their estranged father to return home for Christmas for the first time since he walked out on his family 20 years ago.

movies.title: Yakuza Law
movies.summary: A story of yakuza lynching during the Edo, Taisho, and Showa periods.
movies.description_full: A story of yakuza lynching during the Edo, Taisho, and Showa periods.
movies.synopsis: A story of yakuza lynching during the Edo, Taisho, and Showa periods.

movies.title: Blackhat
movies.summary: Nick Hathaway, an extremely talented hacker who has gone astray, finds his way out of a 15 year prison sentence when parts of a computer code he once wrote during his youth appears in a malware that triggered a terrorist attack in a nuclear power plant in China. This opportunity will reunite him with an old friend but will also put him in the middle of a power game between the American and Chinese government as well as an arch villain hacker whose identity he has to find if he wants to keep his freedom and his life.
